parameterdescription.para: the group the RadioButton belongs to.
true if the RadioButton should be marked.

detaileddescription.para: Draws the box i.a not the caption.

parameterdescription.para: a Graphics object to draw with.

detaileddescription.para: Checks if the RadioButton is marked.

simplesect.para: true if the RadioButton is marked.

detaileddescription.para: Sets the RadioButton to be marked.

parameterdescription.para: true if the RadioButton should be marked.

detaileddescription.para: Sets the group the RadioButton should belong to.
Gets the group the RadioButton belongs to.

simplesect.para: the group the RadioButton belongs to.

detaileddescription.para: Adjusts the RadioButtons size to fit the font size.

Draws the Widget. It is called by the parent widget when it is time for the Widget to draw itself. The graphics object is set up so that all drawing is relative to the Widget, i.e coordinate (0,0) is the top-left corner of the Widget. It is not possible to draw outside of a Widgets dimension.

parameterdescription.para: a Graphics object to draw with.

detaileddescription.para: Draws a the Widget border. A border is drawn around a Widget. The width and height of the border is therefore the Widgets height+2*bordersize. Think of a painting that has a certain size, the border surrounds the painting.

parameterdescription.para: a Graphics object to draw with.

detaileddescription.para: Called if a key is pressed when the widget has keyboard focus. If a key is held down the widget will generate multiple key presses.

memberdef.argsstring: (int x, int y, int button, int count)
memberdef.name: mouseClick

detaileddescription.para: Called when a mouse button is pressed and released (clicked) when the mouse is in the Widget area or if the Widget has focus.

parameterdescription.para: the x coordinate of the mouse relative to the Widget itself.
the y coordinate of the mouse relative to the Widget itself.

detaileddescription.para: A RadioButton which can be grouped into RadioButtons groups. In a RadioButton group, only one of the RadioButtons can be selected.
